messages.text: "Blumenauer is asking if you two can talk at 1:15- I put some travel time on your calendar but not sure if you need it.       Can you do 1:15 instead of 1:30? "
"Yes"
"Never mind- keeping 1:30. Thanks. "
"Ok thx. "
"You are going to need to change my password. It expires tomorrow. "
"Can you bring your laptop into the office tomorrow? I'll be there. Needs to be connected to the city network "
"Ok"
"I'll remind you in the am "
"Good morning! Please   Remember to bring in your laptop so I can change your password"
"Aja can u come in for a sec thx "
"Veg pizza?"
"Yes"
"Do u want it now? It's here. "

"Been trying to line up an interview with Anderson Cooper today. Aja says yes to the time slot. 5:30 pm. Haven't heard back from Sonia or Jamal. Are you ok with that if it works out? Would be the same link Adam set you up with to just click call. "

"Been trying to line up an interview with Anderson Cooper today. Aja says yes to the time slot. 5:30 pm. Haven't heard back from Sonia or Jamal. Are you ok with that if it works out? Would be the same link Adam set you up with to just click call. "
"Same material... fed presence, etc.."
"Federal authorities answer questions about role in Portland https://www.oregonlive.com/portland/2020/07/federal-authorities-answer-questions-about-role-in-portland.html"
"FYI... DHS held this press conference today."
"I see you"
"Liked “I see you”"
"Sorry but I now have a couple of other questions "
"Sorry. I know we're way over the time they set. I hadn't realized they hadn't done the public involvement "
"No problem. These are good questions. We're going to speed the rest of the meeting up."
"Omg. "
"You were wonderful. A true statesman and leader "
"Thx. I'm just flabbergasted. "
"And I never use that word. "
"Gobsmacked is a good British alternative "
"Lol. "
"PWB has a late issue on SDCs. Sam is working on it. I don't know where they're at on it"
"Is this a forum??"
"Hi Mayor, we are assembled for Parks briefing whenever you're ready. "
"I need to talk to you after this. I have an idea on how we MIGHT end the nightly demonstrations. High risk but we've got nothing to lose. "
"Good! And I have an update on Tribune event. "
"I'm going to write up what I'm thinking. And I'm going to send it to you only for right now. Want your advice. So standby. "
"Sounds good. Can we briefly check in re Tribune event?"
"Yes. After council prep"

"In the Wednesday print edition, the Tribune wants to publish an addendum to their editorial that says you will be taking them up on their call and will be present at the demonstration at 9 tomorrow night. Their deadline to get it in print is 11. Can I give them the okay?"
"Yes"
"I am here with congressman. "
"The number is not coming up on my calendar can you text it to me"
"The number is not coming up on my calendar can you text it to me"
"Mike Schmidt, Sharon Meieran, Lynn Peterson is who I recommend you invite to join you tomorrow night if you want to make calls. Otherwise you can be solo. "
"I'm canceling my time with my daughter this week. I will be available Thursday evening to do the Mondene event if it looks worthwhile. I am still out Friday."

"I talked with Captain Passadore His request is we do this at the portico at City Hall. That's defensible I support this ask. It allows us to do it but if it goes badly it allows us to take action to protect people without creating a flashpoint"
"I will call you. "
"This is a Tribune event, right?"
"Yes asked Aja to set up a planning meeting tomorrow morning at 0830 with our team and ppb "

"It's not a Tribune event in the way you would typically understand a sponsored event. We scoped it with them, Mark Garber will be there with you, they are coordinating media attendance, we are choosing the site and showing up. "
"I spoke with Robert about location. We will discuss and decide in the morning. "
"Listening session only right?"
"I don't want a back and forth with 500 people. "
"I'm sure there is an expectation you'll offer comment at some point. I'll make sure you're prepared for that. But yes, it's a listening session. "
"Not a discussion. "
"It's not all about me. It's about heading the community. "
"Listening. Not heading. "
"Good lord autocorrect. "
"Just emailed updated, and final, talking points."
"Urgent request from CNN"
"Federally-directed intervention is uninvited, untrained, and unwelcome. The Acting Secretary knows we feel that way, but we're happy to tell him again. "
"Things were contained and being de-escalated. They invaded. People are pissed. They caused it. "
"Things were contained and being de-escalated. They invaded. People are pissed. They caused it. "
"Got it. Will let him know."
"When you have thousands of moms marching against you you know you screwed up. "
"Ok yours is better. "
"OPB is asking. I can just send her an answer, no interview necessary "

"At his request, we spoke with Acting Secretary Wolf on June 30. So did the Governor, and we both gave him the same message: they are not helping, they are not welcome, we want them to leave, and we certainly don't want any more of them.      I don't recall them giving clear info about their operational plans, ie 'We're coming.' It was higher-level than that. "
"No. Wrong. Call was 7/14."
"On June 30 we attended an operational briefing. I don't recall any discussion of additional federal intervention. "
"Ok "
"Thank you "
"Please give them Tim's number."
"Mayor, you up for another interview? I ask because yesterday you said no more for a bit."
"This one conflicts with the Parks referral hearing. Let's decline today. "
"I didn't think it would work."
"Tim please call. Did we decide to do naacp or not?"
"Checking on this. We have three different MSNBC asks and they don't seem to be in touch with each other much."
"Please follow up with me directly, Tim. "
"994819   Use this code for Microsoft verification"
"FYI... CNN has breaking news pushing back hit time to 5:48. Will clear by 5:55. Dual in time set now for 5:40. They apologize for the inconvenience."
"Mayor has a hard out by 6"
"I told them that and asked to keep earlier time. They didn't budge. But he'll be done by 5:55 they say."
"Argh. I just got here. I'll wait until 5:30 and text him to come get me. "
"So sorry."
"No sweat."
"Got it"
"Thank you Ted. CNNs most watched program so you reached millions once again."
"Ok. Good. I think. "
"Liked “Ok. Good. I think. ”"
"Good for sure! Messaging against federal presence has gained a ton o traction the last few days."
"Sorry for that. What the heck. "
"I was ready for it. Thankful that it was a statement and not a question. "
"I am assuming PPB is aware that most of the pearl district is in the dark. I don't know what the status of when power will return. But the streets are completely dark."
"I'll check with PBEm and see if they know the cause of the outage"
"Mike Myers is checking now "

"I'm certain that the electric utilities are aware. My concern is really more as to whether or not demonstrators make their way into the pearl district and figure out that it's completely blacked out. History suggests that can be a fairly volatile combination."
"Thx. I don't need a response I just wanted people to be aware."
"Ok I'll make sure PPB incident command knows "
"Thx. "
"Never mind. It just came back on."
"Ok good "

"Sharon I know you have been going to the demonstrations nightly. I will be going this evening at 9 PM to do a listening session with Marc Garber from the Tribune OPB and KOIN. Would you like to participate? It's mostly intended as a listening session. It's based on the editorial they have in their paper."
